summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SmartStore Products page with progressive marketplace sync functionality. All core features tested successfully including sync status tracking, progressive availability, and user interactions.

minor_issues.issue: Minor DOM attachment issue during rapid filter switching
minor_issues.impact: Does not affect functionality, filter still works correctly

passed_tests: Products page loads at /products with correct title 'Products'
Initial state shows 11 products (6 Amazon + 5 Flipkart)
Sync status banner displays 'Your marketplaces are still syncing' with progress '2 of 4 marketplaces synced'
Banner includes progress bar and functional dismiss X button
Marketplace filter dropdown shows All Marketplaces, Amazon (Synced 156), Flipkart (Synced 89), Meesho (Syncing), Wish (Pending)
Meesho and Wish filter options initially disabled/not selectable
Amazon filter shows only 6 Amazon products
Flipkart filter shows only 5 Flipkart products
All Marketplaces filter shows all synced products correctly
Product search by name works (e.g. 'keyboard' finds Mechanical Keyboard RGB)
Product search by SKU works correctly
Product table displays all columns: Product, SKU, Marketplace, Status, Inventory, Price, Actions
Status badges display with correct colors: Ready (green dot), Under review (blue dot), Action required (amber dot)
Low inventory items (<=10 units) highlighted in amber color
Action buttons functional: View, Edit, Publish/Unpublish toggle all clickable
Skeleton states visible for Meesho and Wish with descriptive text
Sidebar shows 'Syncing' badge next to Products navigation item
After 8 seconds: Meesho sync completes with toast notification 'Meesho marketplace sync completed'
Product count increases from 11 to 14 after Meesho sync (added 3 products)
Progress text updates to '3 of 4 marketplaces synced'
Meesho becomes selectable in filter dropdown after sync completion
Meesho filter shows 3 products when selected
After 15 seconds total: Wish sync completes
Final product count reaches 16 (added 2 more products from Wish)
'All marketplaces are now synced' banner appears after completion
All-synced banner dismiss X button works correctly
Toast notifications using sonner library appear at correct timing
Progressive sync availability - marketplaces become selectable only after sync
All marketplace filters functional after full sync completion
